paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant associated with long QT syndrome and its clinical implications.

individual_records.phenotype_details: endometrial cancer with prolonged QTc interval
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One 63-year-old patient with endometrial cancer had the c.1714G>A (p.Gly572Ser) variant in KCNH2.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with long QT syndrome 2.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and variant classification.
variants.additional_notes: The patient experienced a significant increase in QTc interval after chemotherapy.
key_quotes: The baseline EKG, which was performed before surgery, showed normal sinus rhythm with the QTc around 390 ms.
After the first cycle of chemotherapy, the QTc interval significantly increased from 390 to 521 ms.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly described in the text.
